title: Murray: UK can cut red tape by leaving EU
itunes:title: Murray: UK can cut red tape by leaving EU
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence's Jamie Murray says the UK can cut regulatory burdens by leaving the EU. He joins Tom Keene and Michael McKee on Bloomberg Surveillance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: Murray: One benefit for UK of leaving EU is less regulation
